interestingcomments.content: Is it possible to make a program where you can record the movements of a machine and then copy that into a program? /!/ Hello, Im thinking of making a remote control lawnmower where this would be kinda useful so you would not have to do nothing after the first mower. This would be really useful for like a lot of things and really have no idea if it already exist. Thank you!
